title: Epic: Project Scaffolding
description:
Create extensible project structure for Agatha - the multi-agent ad spend optimization system.

## Scope
- Backend directory structure (Python + FastAPI + Google ADK)
- Frontend scaffold (Next.js + TypeScript)
- Configuration files (pyproject.toml, .env.example)
- Docker and deployment configs
- Test framework setup

## Deliverables
- All __init__.py files and empty modules
- pyproject.toml with dependencies
- .env.example with all env vars
- Next.js frontend scaffold
- Stub files for all modules
- pytest and test directory structure
- Dockerfiles (backend + frontend)
- cloudbuild.yaml for GCP deployment
